label: specifiedPackage
comment: A logistics package specified for these transported dangerous goods.

rangeIncludes.comment: A self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained for logistics purposes, such as a box or a barrel which can be filled, partially filled or empty.,A referenced self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained for logistics purposes.

domainIncludes.comment: Goods which may contain a substance which poses risks to people and/or the environment during transportation which is regulated by dangerous goods regulations.
